product.longDescription:
Bring stylish convenience on your next journey with the Elevation™ Plus 22 x 14 x 9 Carry-on Spinner. Keep your most important essentials within reach with the innovative QuickEntry™ pocket, featuring air-mesh sleeves that safely hold up to a 13-inch laptop. The case’s interior offers unmatched packing capabilities, keeping your belongings organized and secure. This unique carry-on spinner meets most airlines' carry-on requirements with the overall 22” x 14” x 9” measurement (check your airline for final requirement.)
  • RightHeight™ handle system with multiple 1” adjustments and an ergonomically designed TPR comfort grip
  • Modernly designed hubcaps with durable and smooth nylon tires
  • Fuzion™ zippers by YKK® eliminate traditional weak points for long-lasting strength and durability
  • Polypropylene material that's known for its flexural strength and fatigue resistance
  • All interior lining fabric is made from Recyclex™ material that's woven from 100% post-consumer recycled plastic bottles
  • Fully removable garment-divider functions as a compression panel, keeping all the belongings organized and wrinkle free while on the go
  • Zippered lining and Wetpak™ pockets on the secondary divider keep all the toiletry and small accessories neat
  • The carry on also comes with a versatile Tecfolio™ pouch for loose charging cables, makeup brushes, and other endless possibilities
  • The keyless TSA-approved lock keeps both compartments secured with the same locking mechanism
  • Integrated AirTag is located subtly right behind the front compartment zipper divider
  • Carry-On size and weight allowances vary by airlines. Go to shop.samsonite.com/airline-carry-on-guide for more details. If the bag is overstuffed, it may not be accepted by the airlines
product.shortDescription: Bring stylish convenience on your next journey with the Elevation™ Plus 22 x 14 x 9 Carry-on Spinner. Keep your most important essentials within reach with the innovative QuickEntry™ pocket, featuring air-mesh sleeves that safely hold up to a 13-inch laptop. The case’s interior offers unmatched packing capabilities, keeping your belongings organized and secure. This unique carry-on spinner meets most airlines' carry-on requirements with the overall 22” x 14” x 9” measurement (check your airline for final requirement.)

tooltip: The total dimensions of the case including handles and wheels
The dimensions of the case without handles or wheels; packing dimensions
Suitcase shell material is made of injection molded polyproplyene, a highly impact-resistant plastic that is strong, lightweight, flexible, and moisture resistant.
Recyclex® polyester fabric, which is created using 100% recycled rPET bottles, is crafted to be durable, flexible, and prevents post-consumer waste from ending up in a landfill.
To learn more about TSA locks and how to set the lock please visit our lock instructions page
Warranty covers manufacturing defects. For more information please visit our warranty page

product.pageTitle: Elevation™ Plus Global Carry-On Spinner | Hardside | Samsonite
product.pageDescription: The Elevation™ Plus Global Carry-On Spinner is a stylish and functional carry-on for your travel needs.
